reviewText: Exactly what it says it is. If you have the right equipment, it's great. And a great story by a great author.

I bought this for my grandson for Christmas so I haven't played it yet. It has come with a german cover so i am hoping that the film will just have german sub titles and be in english. Can anyone re-assure me about this? Susie R.
It came!! In GERMAN!! Why is it not available in ENGLISH????????????
